Topic.Title: Maximum Number of Players on One Game?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

I am creating a game for a large group of people to play simultaneously, yet individually. Will the online version be able to support 140 people playing the same game, at the same time? It would be embarrassing to have everyone log on to play, and then the website crashes/bugs/glitches.

Thanks for the input!
Posts.HTML:
